title: PBE ACCOUNT
body: Guys it has been over 5 monts i asked for a PBE account and i didn't recieve a mail how much time it can last to get a PBE account? pls help me{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
The criteria we use to select PBE testers changes quite frequently. One thing that remains constant is that we look for *really active* players who are a positive influence on the community. At this point, you'll need to continue waiting to see if you'll be accepted into the PBE at a later date.

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for additional details. Let me know if you have any other questions.
Ive been waiting for about 3 years now :L  I was a shaco and rengar main when the assassins got reworked expected to get one then but still waiting
